[{"internalType":"uint16","name":"","type":"uint16"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"gameId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"hunter","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"target","type":"address"}],"name":"recordKill","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"gameId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"register","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"op","type":"address"}],"name":"removeOperator","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"renounceOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint16","name":"newBps","type":"uint16"}],"name":"setPlatformFeeBps","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"gameId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"startGame","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"gameId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"triggerCancellation","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"gameId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"triggerExpiry","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawCreatorFees","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawPlatformFees","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Chain Assassin team","details":"Trust model: operators (set by owner) are trusted to faithfully report kills      and winners from the off-chain game server.  The contract enforces financial      integrity (correct prize math, refunds, reentrancy safety) but does NOT verify      kill proofs on-chain \u2014 that is the server's responsibility.      Accepted risk \u2014 no emergency cancel for ACTIVE games:      There is intentionally no operator-callable cancel for ACTIVE games.  If the      off-chain server goes down during a game, funds remain in escrow until the game      expires (`gameDate + maxDuration`), at which point anyone can call `triggerExpiry()`      to move the game to CANCELLED and unlock full refunds for all players.      This avoids giving operators the power to cancel games at will (potential griefing)      while still guaranteeing funds are never permanently locked.","errors":{"AlreadyClaimed()":[{"details":"Caller has already claimed for this game."}],"AlreadyRegistered()":[{"details":"Caller is already registered."}],"BpsSumNot10000()":[{"details":"BPS fields do not sum to 10 000."}],"CannotSelfKill()":[{"details":"hunter == target."}],"DeadlineInPast()":[{"details":"registrationDeadline is in the past."}],"DeadlineNotPassed()":[{"details":"Registration deadline has not passed yet."}],"EnoughPlayers()":[{"details":"playerCount \u2265 minPlayers so cancellation is not warranted."}],"FirstShrinkMustBeZero()":[{"details":"First shrink entry must start at second 0."}],"GameDateNotAfterDeadline()":[{"details":"gameDate \u2264 registrationDeadline."}],"GameDateNotReached()":[{"details":"block.timestamp < gameDate."}],"GameFull()":[{"details":"playerCount == maxPlayers."}],"HunterNotAlive()":[{"details":"Hunter is already eliminated."}],"HunterNotRegistered()":[{"details":"Hunter address is not registered for this game."}],"MaxDurationZero()":[{"details":"maxDuration is zero."}],"MaxLessThanMin()":[{"details":"maxPlayers < minPlayers."}],"MaxPlayersTooHigh()":[{"details":"maxPlayers > MAX_PLAYERS."}],"MaxPlayersTooLow()":[{"details":"maxPlayers < 2."}],"MinPlayersLessThanPrizeSlots()":[{"details":"minPlayers < number of non-zero prize tiers."}],"MinPlayersTooLow()":[{"details":"minPlayers < 2."}],"Need2ndIf3rdSet()":[{"details":"bps3rd > 0 but bps2nd == 0 (skip not allowed)."}],"NeedFirstPrize()":[{"details":"bps1st must be > 0."}],"NoFees()":[{"details":"Fee balance is zero."}],"NoPrize()":[{"details":"Caller has no prize to claim."}],"NoShrinkSchedule()":[{"details":"No zone-shrink schedule provided."}],"NotEnoughPlayers()":[{"details":"playerCount < minPlayers."}],"NotExpiredYet()":[{"details":"Game has not expired yet (block.timestamp \u2264 gameDate + maxDuration)."}],"NotOperator()":[{"details":"Caller is not an operator or the owner."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"PlatformFeeTooHigh()":[{"details":"Platform fee BPS exceeds maximum allowed."}],"PlayerNotAlive()":[{"details":"Player is already eliminated."}],"PlayerNotRegistered()":[{"details":"Player is not registered for this game."}],"RadiiNotDecreasing()":[{"details":"Zone radii must strictly decrease with each shrink step."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"RegistrationClosed()":[{"details":"Registration deadline has passed."}],"ShrinksNotOrdered()":[{"details":"Zone shrink times are not strictly increasing."}],"TargetNotAlive()":[{"details":"Target is already eliminated."}],"TargetNotRegistered()":[{"details":"Target address is not registered for this game."}],"TitleTooLong()":[{"details":"Title exceeds MAX_TITLE_LENGTH bytes."}],"TopKillerNotRegistered()":[{"details":"topKiller is not registered for this game."}],"TopKillerZeroAddress()":[{"details":"topKiller is zero when bpsKills > 0."}],"TransferFailed()":[{"details":"An ETH transfer via `call` failed."}],"UnusedTopKillerNotZero()":[{"details":"topKiller was passed a non-zero address when bpsKills == 0."}],"UnusedWinnerNotZero()":[{"details":"An unused winner slot (bps == 0) was passed a non-zero address."}],"WinnerNotRegistered()":[{"details":"A winner is not registered for this game."}],"WinnerZeroAddress()":[{"details":"A required winner address is zero."}],"WinnersNotUnique()":[{"details":"Two or more winner slots share the same address."}],"WrongEntryFee()":[{"details":"msg.value \u2260 entryFee."}],"WrongPhase()":[{"details":"The game is not in the required phase."}],"ZeroAddress()":[{"details":"A zero-address was passed where a real address is required."}]},"events":{"GameCreated(uint256,string,uint128,uint128,uint16,uint16,int32,int32)":{"details":"The platform fee applicable to this game is not stored explicitly; it can be      derived as `BPS_TOTAL - (bps1st + bps2nd + bps3rd + bpsKills + bpsCreator)`.      Off-chain indexers should read the game config at creation time to reconstruct it."},"PlayerEliminated(uint256,address,address)":{"params":{"eliminator":"The hunter, or `address(0)` for admin/zone eliminations."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addOperator(address)":{"params":{"op":"Address to add as operator. Must not be address(0)."}},"claimPrize(uint256)":{"details":"The claimable amount is the sum of all matching BPS shares (winner1/2/3 + topKiller).      Reentrancy-safe via OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard.","params":{"gameId":"The game in ENDED phase."}},"claimRefund(uint256)":{"details":"Returns exactly `config.entryFee` per player.  No platform fees are deducted      because platform fees are only accrued in `endGame()`.      Reentrancy-safe via OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard.","params":{"gameId":"The game in CANCELLED phase."}},"constructor":{"params":{"_platformFeeBps":"Initial global platform fee in BPS."}},"createGame((string,uint128,uint16,uint16,uint40,uint40,uint32,int32,int32,int32,int32,uint16,uint16,uint16,uint16,uint16),(uint32,uint32)[])":{"params":{"params":"Game configuration (see CreateGameParams).","shrinks":"Zone-shrink schedule; must be non-empty with strictly increasing `atSecond`."},"returns":{"gameId":"The newly assigned game ID (starts at 1, monotonically increases)."}},"eliminatePlayer(uint256,address)":{"params":{"gameId":"The active game.","player":"The player to eliminate."}},"endGame(uint256,address,address,address,address)":{"details":"A player may hold multiple roles (e.g. winner1 + topKiller) and will receive      the sum of all matching BPS shares in a single `claimPrize` call.      Winner addresses must be distinct from each other when their BPS > 0.      topKiller is allowed to overlap with any winner.      Winners are only required to be registered, not alive \u2014 final standings are      determined by the off-chain server which may use custom scoring rules.","params":{"gameId":"The active game.","topKiller":"Top killer (required if bpsKills > 0, must be address(0) otherwise).","winner1":"1st place (required).","winner2":"2nd place (required if bps2nd > 0, must be address(0) otherwise).","winner3":"3rd place (required if bps3rd > 0, must be address(0) otherwise)."}},"getClaimableAmount(uint256,address)":{"details":"Returns 0 if game is not ENDED, player has already claimed, or player      holds no winning position.  A player may hold multiple roles and will      receive the sum of all matching BPS shares."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"recordKill(uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Called by the off-chain server after verifying QR-scan proof.","params":{"gameId":"The active game.","hunter":"The player who made the kill.","target":"The player who was eliminated."}},"register(uint256)":{"params":{"gameId":"The game in REGISTRATION phase."}},"removeOperator(address)":{"details":"No-op if `op` is not currently an operator.","params":{"op":"Address to remove."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setPlatformFeeBps(uint16)":{"details":"Only affects games created after this call.","params":{"newBps":"New platform fee in BPS. Must be \u2264 MAX_PLATFORM_FEE_BPS."}},"startGame(uint256)":{"details":"Cannot be called before `gameDate`. The registration deadline only gates new      registrations, not the operator's ability to start.","params":{"gameId":"The game to start."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"triggerCancellation(uint256)":{"details":"Anyone can call this \u2014 it's a permissionless trigger, not an admin action.","params":{"gameId":"The game in REGISTRATION phase."}},"triggerExpiry(uint256)":{"details":"Anyone can call this. Expiry is computed as `gameDate + maxDuration`.      Works for both ACTIVE games (server died) and REGISTRATION games that      met minPlayers but were never started by the operator.      After cancellation, players may claim full refunds.      No platform fees are accrued since endGame was never called.","params":{"gameId":"The game in REGISTRATION or ACTIVE phase."}},"withdrawCreatorFees(address)":{"params":{"to":"Recipient address. Must not be address(0)."}},"withdrawPlatformFees(address)":{"params":{"to":"Recipient address. Must not be address(0)."}}},"stateVariables":{"MAX_PLAYERS":{"details":"Keeps killCount (uint16, max 65 535) safe from overflow since a player      can record at most MAX_PLAYERS \u2212 1 kills in a single game."},"_gameConfigs":{"details":"gameId \u2192 immutable game configuration."},"_gameStates":{"details":"gameId \u2192 mutable game state."},"_zoneShrinks":{"details":"gameId \u2192 zone-shrink schedule (ordered by atSecond, ascending)."},"killCount":{"details":"uint16 is safe because MAX_PLAYERS (9 999) bounds the maximum possible kills."}},"title":"ChainAssassin \u2014 On-chain game contract for real-world \"Assassin\" hunts","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"CreatorFeesWithdrawn(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a game creator withdraws accumulated creator fees."},"GameCancelled(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a game is cancelled (deadline or expiry)."},"GameCreated(uint256,string,uint128,uint128,uint16,uint16,int32,int32)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new game is created."},"GameEnded(uint256,address,address,address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a game transitions to ENDED."},"GameStarted(uint256,uint16)":{"notice":"Emitted when a game transitions to ACTIVE."},"KillRecorded(uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted alongside PlayerEliminated for hunter kills; carries the kill relationship."},"OperatorAdded(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when an operator is added."},"OperatorRemoved(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when an operator is removed."},"PlatformFeeBpsUpdated(uint16,uint16)":{"notice":"Emitted when the owner changes the global platform fee rate."},"PlatformFeesWithdrawn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the owner withdraws accumulated platform fees."},"PlayerEliminated(uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a player is eliminated (by a kill or zone / admin 1k8afYWf4JPZFh1M4"]},"src/IChainAssassin.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2c77aba4765d10340d932f0b403c164f123d7adfe7e24428f55b99d248b5fcfd","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://28190f83da7d2dfa3ddbda24bd520e86943dc4f687c2a62205d8978380c68a5d","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ9iiG1MWZGTeJV5wPPKhZnzyWcg5atPXXCCVLHvqoKo8"]}},"version":1}

params.op: Address to add as operator. Must not be address(0).

claimPrize(uint256).details: The claimable amount is the sum of all matching BPS shares (winner1/2/3 + topKiller).      Reentrancy-safe via OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard.

claimRefund(uint256).details: Returns exactly `config.entryFee` per player.  No platform fees are deducted      because platform fees are only accrued in `endGame()`.      Reentrancy-safe via OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard.

params._platformFeeBps: Initial global platform fee in BPS.

params.shrinks: Zone-shrink schedule; must be non-empty with strictly increasing `atSecond`.

returns.gameId: The newly assigned game ID (starts at 1, monotonically increases).

endGame(uint256,address,address,address,.details: A player may hold multiple roles (e.g. winner1 + topKiller) and will receive      the sum of all matching BPS shares in a single `claimPrize` call.      Winner addresses must be distinct from each other when their BPS > 0.      topKiller is allowed to overlap with any winner.      Winners are only required to be registered, not alive  final standings are      determined by the off-chain server which may use custom scoring rules.

params.topKiller: Top killer (required if bpsKills > 0, must be address(0) otherwise).
params.winner2: 2nd place (required if bps2nd > 0, must be address(0) otherwise).
params.winner3: 3rd place (required if bps3rd > 0, must be address(0) otherwise).

getClaimableAmount(uint256,address).details: Returns 0 if game is not ENDED, player has already claimed, or player      holds no winning position.  A player may hold multiple roles and will      receive the sum of all matching BPS shares.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recordKill(uint256,address,address).details: Called by the off-chain server after verifying QR-scan proof.

params.hunter: The player who made the kill.

removeOperator(address).details: No-op if `op` is not currently an operator.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPlatformFeeBps(uint16).details: Only affects games created after this call.

params.newBps: New platform fee in BPS. Must be  MAX_PLATFORM_FEE_BPS.

startGame(uint256).details: Cannot be called before `gameDate`. The registration deadline only gates new      registrations, not the operator's ability to start.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

triggerCancellation(uint256).details: Anyone can call this  it's a permissionless trigger, not an admin action.

triggerExpiry(uint256).details: Anyone can call this. Expiry is computed as `gameDate + maxDuration`.      Works for both ACTIVE games (server died) and REGISTRATION games that      met minPlayers but were never started by the operator.      After cancellation, players may claim full refunds.      No platform fees are accrued since endGame was never called.

params.gameId: The game in REGISTRATION or ACTIVE phase.

params.to: Recipient address. Must not be address(0).
Recipient address. Must not be address(0).

BPS_TOTAL().notice: BPS denominator  all bps* fields must sum to this value.

MAX_PLATFORM_FEE_BPS().notice: Maximum allowed platform fee in BPS (50% = 5000).

MAX_PLAYERS().notice: Hard cap on maxPlayers per game.

MAX_TITLE_LENGTH().notice: Maximum allowed title length in bytes.

claimPrize(uint256).notice: Claim prize winnings for the caller in an ended game.

claimRefund(uint256).notice: Claim a full refund for the caller in a cancelled game.

createGame((string,uint128,uint16,uint16.notice: Create a new game with the given parameters and zone-shrink schedule.

creatorFeesAccrued(address).notice: Accumulated creator fees per address, withdrawable by each creator.

eliminatePlayer(uint256,address).notice: Eliminate a player without crediting any hunter (zone death, disconnect, etc.).

endGame(uint256,address,address,address,.notice: End a game and record the final standings.

getClaimableAmount(uint256,address).notice: Calculate the claimable prize amount for `player` in game `gameId`.

getGameConfig(uint256).notice: Return the immutable configuration for a game.

getGameState(uint256).notice: Return the mutable state for a game.

getPlayerInfo(uint256,address).notice: Return registration status, alive status, kill count, claim status, and player number.

getZoneShrinks(uint256).notice: Return the zone-shrink schedule for a game.

hasClaimed(uint256,address).notice: gameId  player  has claimed prize or refund.

nextGameId().notice: Monotonically increasing game ID counter. First game is ID 1.

platformFeeBps().notice: Global platform fee rate in BPS, set by owner. Applied to every game.

platformFeesAccrued().notice: Accumulated platform fees across all games, withdrawable by owner.

playerNumber(uint256,address).notice: gameId  player  1-based registration number (order of registration).

recordKill(uint256,address,address).notice: Record a kill: mark target as eliminated and increment hunter's kill count.

register(uint256).notice: Register the caller for a game by paying the exact entry fee.

setPlatformFeeBps(uint16).notice: Update the global platform fee rate.

startGame(uint256).notice: Transition a game from REGISTRATION to ACTIVE.

triggerCancellation(uint256).notice: Cancel a game that failed to reach minPlayers by the registration deadline.

triggerExpiry(uint256).notice: Cancel a game that has exceeded its maximum duration without ending.

withdrawCreatorFees(address).notice: Withdraw all accumulated creator fees for the caller.

withdrawPlatformFees(address).notice: Withdraw all accumulated platform fees to `to`.
